mousePassthroughDescription: When checked, the mouse cannot interact with the model, and clicks will pass through to the desktop. Uncheck to interact with the model on hover.
disableAdjustMode: Press ESC to Disable Adjust Mode
adjustModeDescription: When enabled, you can drag and resize the model window. Please click again to disable after adjustment.
wsPortError: WebSocket port must be between 1024 and 65535.
portInUse: Port {{port}} is already in use. Please change the port in the settings or close the application using it.
dragMessageBoxToAdjust: Drag to reposition the message box
